summary: Propose a data-driven appraoch that improves the zero-shot trajectory tracking performance of a real-world quadrotor.
title: Deep Neural Networks for Improved, Impromptu Trajectory Tracking of Quadrotors

summary: Propose an expressive parameterization of orthogonal convolution for Lipschitz constrained convolutional neural networks to achieve state-of-the-art deterministic provable robustness under L2 metric on MNIST and CIFAR10 as well as tighter Wasserstein distance estimation bound.
title: Preventing Gradient Attenuation in Lipschitz Constrained Convolutional Networks

summary: Propose a pipeline that performs musical timbre transfer directly in the waveform space
title: TimbreTron: A WaveNet(CycleGAN(CQT(Audio))) Pipeline for Musical Timbre Transfer
